name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!: Kono Yokubukai Game ni Shinpan wo!
summary: The protagonist, Kazuma, puts on a cursed ring that steals the underwear of those around him. The following day, he finds a large amount of underwear in his possession but doesn’t know who owns them. After asking Vanir for his expert opinion on the ring, Kazuma learns that a vast sum of money is required to lift its curse. From there, a new adventure begins to gather the funds to remove Kazuma’s cursed ring.
